column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Tried a few pastries from Common Bond today.  Considering all the hype that has been around this bakery
column2: I was a bit underwhelmed with the pastries that I tried.  Although I found some to be quite good
column3: others were lacking.  Went at around 12:30 pm
column4: and there was about a 5-10 minute wait to order and 5-10 more minutes to receive my order.
